summary: A collection of unit tests for the FusionArray component of CuPy, covering type casting, bitwise operations, floor division, in-place modifications, core array methods (aggregation, copying, element checks), operator behavior, and item assignment scenarios, with shared test utilities.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of FusionArray functionality in the CuPy library to prevent regressions and ensure expected behavior across a wide range of array operations.
